text:
@washingtonpost President #DonaldTrump runs a family business👨‍👨‍👧‍👦🇺🇸

Senior advisor @jaredkushner has not a hunch,
but at least he's #Trump's son-in-law!👶

Trump slots all family members into the @WhiteHouse🇺🇸

But @GOP pursues @JoeBiden's son #HunterBiden!🤬
#COVID19 #coronavirus
#TrumpPandemic
